data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2023 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 please find enclosed herewith the unaudited standalone & consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 along with Limited Review Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company.

data.caption: Revised Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result For Quarter And Financial Year Ended On 31St March, 2023 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Along With Auditors Report.
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter and financial year ended on 31st March, 2023 along with Auditors Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: We, Lloyds Metals and Energy Limited hereby share the Investor Presentation of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December'2022 with the various Stakeholder's of the Company.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 31St December, 2022 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter ended on 31st December, 2022 along with Limited Review Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company. The said results were approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their Meeting held today i.e., Friday, 20th January, 2023.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure On Related Party Transactions For Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022 Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018, we hereby submit the attached disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 30th September, 2022.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter & Half Year Ended On 30Th September, 2022 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter & half year ended on 30th September, 2022 along with Limited Review Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company. The said results were approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2022 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2022 along with Limited Review Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company. The said results were approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today.

data.caption: Declaration Pursuant To Regulation 33(3)(D) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 As Amended
data.news_body: In continuous to our earlier intimation we, hereby confirm and declare that the Statutory Auditors of the Company i.e., M/s VSS & Associates, Chartered Accountants, have issued the audit report on Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result For Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2022 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Along With Auditors Report
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2022 along with Auditors Report signed by the statutory auditor of the Company.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 30Th September, 2021 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body: With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter ended on 30th September, 2021 along with Limited Review Report signed by the Statutory Auditor of the Company. The said results were approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2021 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body:
With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2021 along with Limited Review Report signed by the statutory auditor of the Company. The said results were approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today.

The Board Meeting commenced today at 11:30 a.m. and concluded at 02: 15 p.m.

The above intimation is given to you for your record, Kindly take the note of the same.

data.caption: Submission Of Half Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018, we hereby submit the attached disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the Half Year Ended 31st March, 2021.

We request you to kindly take the note of the same.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result For Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021 Under Regulation 33(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Along With Auditors Report.
data.news_body:
With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2021 along with Auditors Report signed by the statutory auditor of the Company.
The Board Meeting commenced today at 04:00 p.m. and concluded at 06.30 p.m.
The above intimation is given to you for your record, Kindly take the note of the same.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Financial Result For Quarter And Nine Months Ended On 31St December, 2020
data.news_body:
With reference to above subject and pursuant to the provision of Regulations 33(3)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December, 2020 along with Limited Review Report signed by the statutory auditor of the Company.

The Board Meeting commenced today at 01:00 p.m. and concluded at 02:45 p.m.

The above intimation is given to you for your record, Kindly take the note of the same.
